page.title: 05Employment in Waters Upton
page.content: Employment opportunities in this area are limited. The traditional occupation of farmer/ farm worker is now limited, with very high levels of mechanisation in the wealthy farms of the area. Equally young people choose to move to other areas for work in towns and cities. A number of people in the area work outside of it, notably in Wellington or Telford. These people tend to be white-collar workers/management, who can afford the higher prices of houses away from the newer Development Corporation housing estates of Telford, and also have private transport, as public transport is limited. The region of East Shropshire suffers from very high unemployment (21% in 1984) and therefore opportunities for young or old are very limited.
